title: Provides a tax abatement for landowners allowing snowmobiling on such land
summary: Provides a tax abatement of 10% for landowners allowing snowmobiling on such land; such abatement limited to those parcels crossed by a trail which is maintained by a county, city, town or village as a part of a system of trails and eligible for aid pursuant to the parks, recreation and historic preservation law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing tax abatement for private landowners who allow snowmobiling on such land
